head.title: GStreamer Google Summer of Code: Haskell

body.h1: GStreamer Google Summer of Code: Haskell Bindings
body.p: Improve GObjectIntrospection based bindings generator to be able to automatically generate bindings for GStreamer and also extend the GObject/GLib/GIO bindings to make usage of GStreamer possible.
As a result there should be new, GStreamer 1.x based bindings.
